name: {{ packageName }}
description: {% if finalDescription %}{{ finalDescription }}{% else %}TypeScript port of {{ goPackageName }} with 100% API compatibility{% endif %}

repository.url: {% if repositoryUrl %}{{ repositoryUrl }}{% else %}https://github.com/TSports/{{ packageName | replace(from='@tsports/', to='') }}{% endif %}

bugs.url: {% if repositoryUrl %}{{ repositoryUrl }}{% else %}https://github.com/TSports/{{ packageName | replace(from='@tsports/', to='') }}{% endif %}/issues

homepage: {% if repositoryUrl %}{{ repositoryUrl }}{% else %}https://github.com/TSports/{{ packageName | replace(from='@tsports/', to='') }}{% endif %}#readme
